title: Zoo Simulator Project
imageAlt: Screenshot of the zoo simulator project
description: Developed a zoo simulator game using Java, where players design enclosures, manage animals, and grow their zoo using object-oriented principles.

title: Speech-to-Text (Speechify-Style) App
imageAlt: Microphone icon representing speech to text application
description: Created a speech-to-text application that turns spoken audio into text, improving accessibility and note-taking with real-time transcription.
